original_title: History Rings True: Red Sox Opening Day Ring Ceremony
overview: Winning their first World Series in 86 years, the Old Town Team made baseball history, and true believers throughout the entire nation. History Rings True offers complete coverage of the historic Red Sox Ring Ceremony that took place at Fenway Park on the 2005 Home Opener on April 11th 2005.
tagline: The Boston Red Sox receive their rings for winning the 2004 World Series.
title: History Rings True: Red Sox Opening Day Ring Ceremony
